EmailTemplate.description: This is sent to PMs when payroll has to be approved before the deadline
EmailTemplate.name: SF to PM: Payroll to approve all reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Payroll reminder for {!Wave__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
If you haven't yet, please approve all payroll for your PLs, RAMs, LOs and Practitioners as soon as possible. Evolution will process payments this coming Monday.
Please go to your views in Job Applications to approve their payroll. Click on the link below to get to the Job Applications home page: https://na8.salesforce.com/a17/o
For PL salary approvals go to the view, "Payroll approvals {!Wave__c.Name}" For LOs, Rams and Practitioners go to the view "Payroll approvals Summer-long roles {!Wave__c.Wave_Cluster__c}".
Thanks!
This is an automatic email, sent 4 days after the first email.
